title: Builds for Top and Jungle Rek'Sai
body:
I'm looking at a bruiser-ish build top like Boots, BoTRK/Hydra, Tri-Force/Black Clever, then tank. Give me your opinions and I need advice on when to build Hydra or BoTRK and Tri-Force or Black Clever. I'm still inexperienced at this :P
And a tank-ish build in jungle like Boots, jungle item with hulk, Black Clever, then tank.

replies.body:
What i get for jungle most of the time:
1) Blue Smite - Warrior
2) Merc Treads (Ninja Tabi if mostly armour)
3) Hydra
4) Tri Force
5) Randuins
6) Depends on team comps but usually a defensive item
Here's a game i played today
Rek'Sai has recieved like no joke 5 damage nerfs or something like that. Build full tank in both positions. If anything, I'd get a Black Cleaver if you had 2/3 other AD damage champs on your team.
